summary: A young German woman bonds with an elderly Japanese woman while touring the Fukushima region of Japan in the aftermath of the 2011 earthquake.
cast: Rosalie Thomass|Kaori Momoi|Nami Kamata|Moshe Cohen|Honsho Hasayaka|Nanako|Aya Irizuki|Thomas Lettow|Masa Kokubo|Kurumi Aizawa|Megumi|Tokuko Eguchi|Hosetsu Sato|Tadashi Endo|Naomi Kamara
title: Recuerdos desde Fukushima
